short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the user to input text through a popup and submit it to ChatGPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CodeGenius+  is a Chrome extension designed to aid in software development by leveraging artificial intelligence to generate code and provide explanations for it. This extension is especially valuable for developers who need a convenient tool to quickly generate and understand different coding solutions right in their browsers.

Upon activation, CodeGenius+  creates an interactive button on the page that prompts the user for their programming requirements. It then communicates with the underlying AI model to generate high-quality code based on the requirements input.

Key features:

Button Generation: A button is dynamically created and inserted into the web page. This button acts as the main user interface for the plugin, allowing users to initiate the code generation process at any time. The button is styled to be easily noticeable and blends well with most websites' design.

User Input Prompt: When clicked, the button triggers a prompt asking the user to enter their code requirements. This interaction model ensures that the AI understands the context and the specific needs of the user before generating code.

Code Generation and Explanation: Based on the user's input, the AI system generates relevant code and provides an in-depth explanation of the code's functionality. This dual-approach helps users to not only get a ready-made code snippet but also gain a good understanding of how it works.

Real-Time Integration: The extension continually checks for changes in the page and ensures that the button is always present, providing real-time integration with the user's browsing experience.

By integrating with a powerful AI model like ChatGPT, the CodeGenius+  Chrome extension simplifies the software development process, making it more approachable for both novice and experienced developers.
